title: Investors Eye India Budget to Unlock Gains in State Companies
description: India’s state-run stocks may extend their outperformance versus the broader market, according to investors watching the Feb. 1 budget for signals on whether the government will revive stake sales to raise funds and support economic growth.
content: India’s state-run stocks may extend their outperformance versus the broader market, according to investors watching the Feb. 1 budget for signals on whether the government will revive stake sales to raise funds and support economic growth.
